titleStmt.title: Description of Ovid's Metamorphoses, books 1-3, in Italian and Hebrew translation.

availability.licence: This metadata, accompanying images, and the content of London, British Library, Oriental Manuscripts Add MS 26916: Ovid's Metamorphoses, books 1-3, in Italian and Hebrew translation. are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. See the Creative Commons Zero 1.0 Universal page for usage details, https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/.

notesStmt.note: Tidemark in bottom third, throughout the volume. Occasional mould spots.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Ovid's Metamorphoses, books 1-3, in Italian and Hebrew translation.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Italian and Hebrew in Italian cursive script, vocalised, of the 18th century.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine: 'Ovid. Metamorph. Books I-III. Italian & Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Additional 26,916.'

history.provenance:
Acquisition:
Giuseppe Almanzi (b. 1801, d. 1860), bibliophile; his manuscript no. 288: his library including 322 medieval Hebrew manuscripts were purchased en bloc by the British Museum in October 1865 for £1,000 through Asher & Co., Berlin bookseller and dealer to the British Museum: inscribed, folio [110v] (fse002v).
